page.title: 14Market Gardening - one
page.content: Market gardening or horticulture is good in this area because we have good soil, and the winters are not too extreme.It is a central area for distributing to other parts of the country. In Wickhamford the market gardening is mainly family businesses and some have formed cooperatives. Many changes have been made, glass houses have been fitted with larger panes to give more light. Farmers have kept up to date in technology,they have computers to control the heat,ventilation, and the amount of fertiliser needed by the plants. Some of the crops are peppers, cucumbers, lettuce, sprouts, cabbages and tomatoes.
